meanings.definition: Having a tendency to cling or adhere closely.
meanings.sent1: The sticky tape was clingier than expected.
meanings.sent2: The baby's hands were clingier than usual today.
meanings.sent3: The clingier gloves made it hard for him to use his phone.
meanings.sent4: Her clingier attitude towards her friends was noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The clingier fabric hugged her skin tightly.

meanings.definition: Comparatively more inclined to cling or stick closely.
meanings.sent1: The new glue was even clingier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The wet clothes felt clingier after being in the dryer.
meanings.sent3: The clingier cat refused to leave its owner's lap.
meanings.sent4: His clingier behavior towards his favorite toy worried his parents.
meanings.sent5: The clingier vines wrapped themselves around the tree trunk.
